page.title: 15PLAYGROUND GAMES OF THE 80's
page.content: One of the favourite{playground {games}at school is{KINGY.}It's a good game because lots and lots of people can play. You stand in a circle with your legs open, someone drops a tennis ball in the centre of the circle and whose ever legs the ball goes through is on. They immediately pick up the ball and try and hit the rest. The game continues until everyone has been hit. {CANNON}is another popular game for the playground but for this you need equal sides. You set up four pegs against a wall, in the same formation as a set of wickets and then you throw a ball at them.Whatever pegs have been knocked down must be built up again whilst the other team try and hit people with the ball. When hit that team member is out and remains out until 3 cannons have been built.
